ygData.subject: Re: Hi there :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy all, I am Fatedhue (primarily) on the Drinal server. I recently hit level 37 and if it weren t for my guildmates, I would have maybe -- all of 128
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy all,<br><br>I am Fatedhue (primarily) on
the Drinal server. I recently hit level 37 and if it
weren't for my guildmates, I would have maybe -- all of
128 wisdom.<br><br>I have to say, I don't think twink
is bad-- but as everyone-- I have a limit on what I
believe is fair twinking. There's something to be said
about making it over the "hump" but not to the point of
taking advantage of new players.<br><br>And finally,
about 12 wis points ago (I'm now at 139 or so)... I was
once told "Did you mean to delete your character--
scrap all your equipment-- and then decide not
to?"<br><br>The person was sincere and I didn't mind too much.
Hurt for a second though. LOL.<br><br>Anyhoo, trust me
on this one. Knowing the game isn't affected by
having or not having. I have a lot more now than before
but nowhere near 170+ wis or a couple hundred plat in
the bank. I have a ton of fun for the most part and
play a good group druid (forget kiting. I can't kite
worth piddling unless I have a chanter).<br><br>Haven't
played this long without getting a ton of kudo's given
-- as well as lessons taken. MUCH taken.
=)<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic... sooo close to
mastering Baking *pout*... heh
